area.key: Variant of GCJ-02, as required by Chinese State Law. Display format is Latitude,Longitude

Under Chinese state law regarding restrictions on geographic data, you must use GCJ-02 encoded coordinates in China or for displaying Chinese coordinates correctly. Display format is Latitude,Longitude
Standard World Geodetic System as used by GPS system, and adopted worldwide except for China (see GCJ-02). Display format is Latitude,Longitude
